message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
I'm not willing to sell the product to you for $100, but I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'll sell it to you for $105.
I'm still not convinced that $105 is the best price. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product.
I'm not willing to sell the product to you for $102, but I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll sell it to you for $108.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll pay $105 for the product, but that's my final offer.
